subject: Tennis
College Athletics
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: The U.S.T.A.’s four-day tournament for top college tennis players is a clear statement that it has begun to view college programs as viable training grounds for the pro ranks.
snippet: The U.S.T.A.’s four-day tournament for top college tennis players is a clear statement that it has begun to view college programs as viable training grounds for the pro ranks.
